bobSnack.text:
Whew, am I BEAT!
*grumble*
And hungry!
I sure could go for a grilled cheese sandwich.
Guess I'll head home and grab a snack.

bobApproach.text:
'The CHX-2000: The best chainsaw ever made!
Includes three fairy spirits to provide
power, speed and durability...
...
HOLD ON!
The fairies were
sent separately?!
...
...
One was sent to
'the cloud shrine',
another to 'the water shrine',
and the last to 'the fire shrine.'
Just what the heck is going on...

bossIntro.text:
Can't you see I'm in the middle of something!
You think it's EASY to fight off every threat to this forest with just a computer and no FINGERS?!

N-no, sir. Not at all!
 I-I just thought you should know that... Bob... he... the CHX-2000...

GAH!
...No matter. I  totally hacked his order! That bumbling lumberjack will never find the fairies he needs! Hahahaha!
Hah... Y-yeah I guess you're right.

cloudFairy.text: Jeez, you sure know how to treat a lady!
Alright, fine! Was getting kinda bored up here anyhow. But only if I can bring my comics and pop!

bossFirstFairy.text: My apologies, sir. It's Bob. He's... Found the first fairy.

Hah,
this cat gif is pretty great. Hahaha! Upvote!
Hmm? You're still here? Honestly, that mouthbreather probably stumbled on the fairy by accident! There's no way he'll find all three. Close the door on your way out?
Hah... Y-yeah, I guess you're right.

waterFairy.text:
La lala la
Oh, well hello there stranger! Ya'll come down to buy some of my seaweed? It's mighty tasty!

Now that you mention it I AM kinda hungry...
But, no! I'm here to get YOU in MY chainsaw! Hop in! ...Uh, please.
Your what now? You mean that doohickey? Well, shucks, I suppose I could. All I really do is sing to this seaweed anyhow. I reckon it'll grow just fine without me.

bossSecondFairy.text: Aw, man! What the heck! You know I like the lights off! It makes me feel like a badass!
SIR! Bob has obtained the second fairy! Something must be done!
Aw, come on, it'll be fine. Besides, I had a huge lunch and I totally need a nap. Get the lights on your way out, would ya?

fireFairy.text: Alright, I overhauled your transmission so she should be good to go! Just promise you'll take good care of her, ya hear? That means no more driving through molten lava, OK?
I-is that? It can't be...The CHX-2000! Ho, baby! You're holding a real work of art, pal!
Tell me about it! You want in?
Y-you mean me?! Wow. I-I'm honored. You won't regret this, pal. I'm gonna soup-up the throttle, hone the chainblade... She'll run like a dream!

bossLastFairy.text: I know, the new iFone model was finally announced! I think it's too big, personally. Though the integrated selfie stick IS a nice touch....
No no no! It's Bob! He's found the last fairy!
What?! H-he has? You fool! Why didn't you warn me! The forest is doomed!

beforeLastBattle.text:
So... It's come to this.
I'm the last line of defense
against the greed of men...

S-sir?
When did you
become so poetic?

Huh, I was wondering
what was behind
that door.
Seems like some kinda
sci-fi tree party or something?
Man, I hate nature.

afterLastBattleCont.text:
Wait a sec...
This Twoot!
'Totally hacked
Bob's chainsaw
order Lol rofl
#ThugLife'

It was you! How dare you
interfere with a man's
online interactions!

Hah. Maybe we're
not so different, you and I.
Shame it has to end this way.
In another lifeâ€¦
Maybe... we could
have been... Smilebook friends.
Hah...
Hahahaha!

afterLastBattleFinal.text:
That was weird.
...
Man, I hate nature.
